# Contributor License Agreement  
**for AutoRes**

This Contributor License Agreement (“Agreement”) applies to all Contributions made to the project **AutoRes** (the “Project”), owned and maintained by **Wataru Kumagai**, **Toma Tanaka** (the “Project Owner”).

By submitting a Contribution to the Project, you agree to the terms of this Agreement.

---

## 1. Definitions

- **“Contribution”** means any code, documentation, data, or other material submitted by you to the Project, including any modifications or additions to existing work.
- **“You”** means the individual making a Contribution.
- **“Project Owner”** means **Wataru Kumagai**, **Toma Tanaka**, including its successors and assigns.

---

## 2. Copyright Ownership

You retain ownership of the copyright in your Contribution.

Nothing in this Agreement transfers ownership of your copyright to the Project Owner.

---

## 3. License Grant (Core Clause)

You hereby grant to the Project Owner a **perpetual, worldwide, royalty-free, irrevocable, transferable, and sublicensable license** to:

- use, reproduce, modify, adapt, and prepare derivative works of your Contribution;
- publicly perform, publicly display, and distribute your Contribution;
- **relicense your Contribution and derivative works under different license terms**, including proprietary or commercial licenses;
- use your Contribution as part of:
  - open source software,
  - enterprise or commercial products,
  - hosted services, SaaS, APIs, or cloud-based offerings.

This license applies to your Contribution in source code, binary form, and any other form.

---

## 4. Patent License

You hereby grant to the Project Owner a **perpetual, worldwide, royalty-free, irrevocable license** under any patent claims you own or control that are necessarily infringed by your Contribution, to:

- make, have made, use, sell, offer for sale, import, and otherwise transfer the Contribution,
- as part of the Project, derivative works, enterprise products, or hosted services.

This patent license applies only to patent claims that are necessarily infringed by your Contribution alone or in combination with the Project.

---

## 5. Moral Rights Waiver (Where Applicable)

To the extent permitted by applicable law, you waive and agree not to assert any moral rights (including rights of attribution or integrity) in your Contribution against the Project Owner or its sublicensees.

---

## 6. Representations and Warranties

You represent and warrant that:

1. You are legally entitled to grant the licenses in this Agreement.
2. Each Contribution is your original work, or you have sufficient rights to submit it under this Agreement.
3. Your Contribution does not knowingly infringe or misappropriate any third-party intellectual property rights.
4. If your Contribution was created in the course of employment, you have obtained permission from your employer to make the Contribution under this Agreement.

---

## 7. No Obligation to Use Contributions

The Project Owner is under no obligation to accept, include, or distribute any Contribution, and may remove or modify Contributions at its discretion.

---

## 8. Attribution

The Project Owner may, but is not required to, credit you as a contributor.  
Nothing in this Agreement requires the Project Owner to display attribution in enterprise, commercial, or hosted offerings.

---

## 9. No Additional Rights

Except for the licenses expressly granted under this Agreement, no other rights or licenses are granted, whether by implication, estoppel, or otherwise.

---

## 10. Governing Law and Jurisdiction

This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of **Japan**, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

---

## 11. Entire Agreement

This Agreement constitutes the entire agreement between you and the Project Owner regarding Contributions to the Project and supersedes any prior understandings or agreements relating to Contributions.

---

## 12. Acceptance

By submitting a Contribution to the Project, including through a pull request, issue, or any other submission mechanism, you agree to be bound by the terms of this Agreement.
